software.name: 007: James Bond
software.Description: 007: James Bond is an Action game, published by Tsukuda Original, which was released in Japan in 1984.

software.name: 3-Jin Mahjong
software.Description: 3-Jin Mahjong is a Miscellaneous game, published by Tsukuda Original, which was released in Japan in 1984.

software.name: Bank Panic
software.Description: Set against the background of America's pioneer era, you as the HERO, are a quick draw artist - whose job it is to protect the customers who are depositing money at the bank. You'll need a sharp eye and fast reflexes to succeed.

software.name: Black Onyx, The
software.Description: The Black Onyx is a Role-Playing game, developed by Bullet Proof Software and published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1987.

software.name: Bomb Jack
software.Description:
'BOMB JACK' is an action game that was released by Tehkan (Koei Tecmo Games) in 1984. Players control 'Jack', a superhero who can leap and glide, to collect all bombs in game stages.
The 'Arcade Archives' series has faithfully reproduced the masterpieces of classic arcade games on the PS4 system while taking advantage of the additional features the PS4 system offers. Players can share play screens and video with the SHARE feature, and can also compete with other players online to improve your standing on the online score ranking leaderboard. Please enjoy the masterpiece that built a generation for video games.

software.name: Borderline
software.Description: Violently dash into the energy zone by freely maneuvering the red jeep. Throughout the first to the fourth scenes, continue to advance in an effort to destroy the enemy fortresses and headquarters by avoiding attacks from the enemy's tanks, armored motorcars, airplanes and missiles. Begin your invasion into the next scene after destroying all of the fortresses of the current scene you are engaged in battle in. When you completely destroy the headquarters in the final fourth scene, the strategic jeep operation that you launched results in a smashing victory for you!

software.name: C-SO!
software.Description: C-SO! is an Action game, developed by Compile and published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1985.

software.name: Castle, The
software.Description: The Castle is an Action game, published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1986.

software.name: Chack'n Pop
software.Description: Chack'n Pop is an Action game, developed and published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1985.

software.name: Challenge Derby
software.Description: Challenge Derby is a Sports game, published by Tsukuda Original, which was released in Japan in 1984.

software.name: Champion Baseball
software.Description: This is a fully appealing and thrilling baseball game in which you can enjoy all imaginable kinds of baseball patterns one after another as in an actual game. This game allows you to compete against the computer team (the P team versus the C team). Also, this game now permits 2 players to compete against each other and assures that your enjoyment will be doubly increased.

software.name: Champion Billiards
software.Description: Champion Billiards is a Sports game, developed by Compile and published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1986.

software.name: Champion Boxing
software.Description: Excitement gradually builds up as you fight in each of the 90 second rounds in this 8 round bout. Your opponent is a tough young blonde fighter. Throw STRAIGHT, JAB and UPPERCUT punches directly to the opponent's face or his body. Keep up the flurry of fast and furious blows by taking advantage of your superior footwork. Warm up in Level 1 and then upgrade your skills by consecutively clearing the higher levels. If, in Level 5, you win by a 10 count KO, you'll become the world champion!
software.Genre: Sports > Individual > Combat > Boxing / Martial Arts

software.name: Champion Golf
software.Description: Champion Golf is a Sports game, published by John Sands Electronics, which was released in Australia in 1983.

software.name: Champion Ice Hockey
software.Description: Champion Ice Hockey is a Sports game, published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1985.

software.name: Champion Kendo
software.Description: Champion Kendo is a Sports game, published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1986.

software.name: Champion Pro Wrestling
software.Description: Champion Pro Wrestling is a Sports game, published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1985.

software.name: Champion Soccer
software.Description: Champion Soccer is a Sports game, published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1984.

software.name: Champion Tennis
software.Description: Serve, receive and smash the ball. Attack your rival's weak point. Use all corners of the court to your advantage and get a glorious victory over your opponent! This is a highly intellectual and competitive sports game which requires sharp nerves and concentration.

software.name: Championship Lode Runner
software.Description: Championship Lode Runner is an Action game, developed by Compile and published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1985.

software.name: Choplifter
software.Description: Man a chopper in the nation's top action adventure. Pockets of international hostages are trapped. All across the world. In the Middle East. In the South Seas. And in a secret base somewhere in a cavern. You man a helicopter rescue team. And your job is to take your helicopter down, rescue the hostages and fly them back to safety. All the while dodging and destroying dangerous enemy fire. An action-packed helicopter game at its best!

software.name: Chuugaku Hisshuu Ei Bunpou: Chuugaku 1 Nensei You
software.Description: Chuugaku Hisshuu Ei Bunpou: Chuugaku 1 Nensei You is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1983.

software.name: Congo Bongo
software.Description: Playing as the Hunter, you will climb up treacherous cliffs chasing after the gorilla. You will encounter many dangers along the way - watch out for falling coconuts and pesky monkeys! Finally, capture the gorilla to preserve the Hunter's honor.

software.name: DokiDoki Penguin Land
software.Description: DokiDoki Penguin Land is a Puzzle game, developed and published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1985.

software.name: Dragon Wang
software.Description: Dragon Wang is an Action game, published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1985.

software.name: Drol
software.Description: Drol is an Action game, published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1985.

software.name: Elevator Action
software.Description: As Agent 17, it is your mission to steal government documents from a heavily-guarded top-secret defense building. By making your way down elevators and escalators, you must pick up files and escape to the getaway car in the garage. But watch out for enemy agents!

software.name: Exerion
software.Description:
'EXERION' is a shooting game that was released from JALECO in 1983. Players must grapple with the inertial force of their fighter within a pseudo-3D space all while properly using dual and single beam weapons to destroy incoming enemies.
The 'Arcade Archives' series has faithfully reproduced the masterpieces of classic arcade games on the PS4 system while taking advantage of the additional features the PS4 system offers. Players can share play screens and video with the SHARE feature, and can also compete with other players online to improve your standing on the online score ranking leaderboard.
Please enjoy the masterpiece that built a generation for video games

software.name: Flicky
software.Description: Tiger cats prowl on every shelf. Slimy Iggy lizards crawl slowly but surely closer. Flicky, the little blue bird that has a soft spot for Chicks, wants to help them get to the exit. But the cats and lizards stand in their way!

software.name: Flipper
software.Description: A catchy rhythmical flipper sound accompanies this computer pinball video game. Featuring a D.T. (drop target) that enables you to earn bonus points and a K.H. (kicker hole) that entitles you to earn bonus points X a multiplication rate! Take good aim, and shoot away! Here's wishing you success as you merrily flip your way around the playfield in search of the proverbial "high score".

software.name: Girl's Garden
software.Description: Girl's Garden is an Action game, developed and published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1984.

software.name: Golgo 13
software.Description: Golgo 13 is an Action game, published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1984.

software.name: GP World
software.Description: GP World is a Racing game, published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1985.

software.name: Gulkave
software.Description: Gulkave is an Action game, developed by Compile and published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1986.

software.name: Guzzler
software.Description: Guzzler is an Action game, published by Tsukuda Original, which was released in Japan in 1983.

software.name: H.E.R.O.
software.Description: H.E.R.O. is an Action game, published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1985.

software.name: Hang-On II
software.Description: Hang-On II is a Racing game, developed and published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1985.

software.name: Home Mahjong
software.Description: Home Mahjong is a Miscellaneous game, published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1984.

software.name: Hustle Chumy
software.Description: Hustle Chumy is an Action game, developed by Compile and published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1984.

software.name: Hyper Sports
software.Description: Hyper Sports is a Sports game, published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1985.

software.name: Lode Runner
software.Description: In this game, the player is required to repeatedly "think" and "take action" to go through and clear the maze scenes by solving their mysterious riddles while averting the enemy's guards who are relentlessly in pursuit of him. After collecting all of the gold chests, you must come up with fresh new ideas in order to successfully challenge the next level scene. Although your experience gained from the previous play action will help you overcome some of the future maze scenes, you still have to constantly be on the alert. You can also enjoy creating your own games by using the keyboard. This is an intriguing game which requires intellectual depth to skillfully maneuver the unknown maze structures that consecutively develop one after another.

software.name: Mahjong
software.Description: Mahjong is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1983.

software.name: Monaco GP
software.Description: Take control of a red formula car travelling at high speed through the streets, speeding up, jumping, maneuvering to the right and left to avoid the cars obstructing the way and reckless cars coming close to your machine. Be on the lookout for an ambulance suddenly passing by... And keep an eye out for the signposts! Thrill-packed challenges such as the slip zones, dangerous construction sites as well as sharp curves and narrow bay bridges also appear. When in the tunnel, the headlights of your car are the only thing you can rely upon. After improving your skill by going through the beginner's level 1, you can move on to the more difficult high levels 2 and 3.

software.name: N-Sub
software.Description: A big battle develops on a cobalt blue sea. Fire a torpedo when you find the enemy's ships. Avoid the destroyer's attack by using your missiles, torpedoes and depth bombs. Counterattack and sink the enemy's ships. The enemy attack becomes more intense with each new round!

software.name: Ninja Princess
software.Description: Ninja Princess is an Action game, developed and published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1986.

software.name: Okamoto Ayako no Match Play Golf
software.Description: Okamoto Ayako no Match Play Golf is a Sports game, published by Tsukuda Original, which was released in Japan in 1984.

Release.name: Okamoto Ayako no Match Play Golf

ReleaseImages.Image: Okamoto Ayako no Match Play Golf (JP)-319298_front.jpg
Okamoto Ayako no Match Play Golf (JP)-319298_back.jpg
Okamoto Ayako no Match Play Golf (JP)-319298_side.jpg

software.name: Orguss
software.Description: Orguss is an Action game, published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1984.

software.name: Othello
software.Description: Othello is a Miscellaneous game, published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1985.

software.name: Pacar
software.Description: PACAR, a mischievous car, runs through the 3D routes freely advancing and reversing at fast and slow speeds. Try to delete all the dots on the screen while avoiding the 2 kinds of enemy cars. When you pass through the special dots, PACAR becomes more and more invincible as it increases its power and will be free from damage even when it crashes into the enemy car. Keep up the torrid pace and destroy as many of the enemy cars as possible!

software.name: Pachinko
software.Description: Pachinko is a Miscellaneous game, published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1983.

software.name: Pachinko II
software.Description: Pachinko II is a Miscellaneous game, published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1984.

software.name: Pitfall II
software.Description: Here I am, Pitfall Harry, plummeting toward the dark thunder of rushing water below... and thinking of the night David Crane called. "I hope you're well rested," he had said. Too rested, I said. I was ready for action. He asked if I'd heard tales of the legendary lost caverns of Machu Picchu in Peru. Or of a roaring, uncharted underground tributary of the Urubamba River replete with waterfalls and deadly electric eels. "Yes," I said. He asked if I knew of the infamous, cursed Raj Diamond. Or of the recent robbery of gold bars from the U.S. Gold Bullion Depository in Fort Knox. And had I heard of vampire bats? Poisonous frogs? Albino scorpions? The dreaded Andean condor? "Yes," I said. And could I still run? Climb? Jump? Could I... swim? "Yes. Yes. Yes. Yes." "Good," said Crane. "Then you'll do it?" "Of course," I said. If only I had known...

software.name: Pop Flamer
software.Description: Pop Flamer is an Action game, published by John Sands Electronics, which was released in Australia in 1983.

software.name: Q*bert
software.Description: Hop Q*bert up and down the steps of a "three-dimensional" pyramid, changing each step's color as he lands. Complete the entire pyramid, and Q*bert moves to a more challenging pyramid. But look out! The crafty arcade creatures are here, too, and they're after Q*bert. Hop out of danger fast - or soar to safety on a flying disc. But watch where you move Q*bert. One hop off the pyramid and he'll be lost in space!

software.name: Rock N' Bolt
software.Description: Rock N' Bolt is an Action game, published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1985.

software.name: Safari Hunting
software.Description: Go deep into the jungle and hunt fierce animals. Your weapon is a mighty tranquilizer gun. Capture the sleeping snakes, gorillas, lions and elephants by putting them in a cage. Capture as many animals as possible, while considering the effective time of the tranquilizer and the available quantity of fuel.

software.name: Safari Race
software.Description: On the vast savanna plain, the SAFARI RACE has just gotten underway. Keep running at full speed, passing other cars while avoiding various wild animals that cross the road. Drive fast, ever onward, taking into consideration the limited time, fuel consumption and dangerous sharp curves. Pass through the checkpoints. Run your car at full throttle towards the goal with the engine operating at its maximum capacity.

software.name: Sega Flipper
software.Description: A catchy rhythmical flipper sound accompanies this computer pinball video game. Featuring a D.T. (drop target) that enables you to earn bonus points and a K.H. (kicker hole) that entitles you to earn bonus points X a multiplication rate! Take good aim, and shoot away! Here's wishing you success as you merrily flip your way around the playfield in search of the proverbial "high score".

software.name: Sega Galaga
software.Description: Take control of a fighter space craft and shoot down the invading aliens. Watch out for the swooping motherships, which will try to steal your fighter. Rescue captured fighters to double your firepower. Earn Perfect Bonuses as you battle your way through wave after wave in different challenging stages.

software.name: Sega SC-3000
software.Description: SG-1000 is a Hardware game, developed and published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1983.

software.name: Sega SG-1000
software.Description: SG-1000 is a Hardware game, developed and published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1983.
software.AKA: Sega SG-1000 (JP), Sega SC-3000 (JP), SG-1000 Hardware (AU, EU), Sega SG-1000 Mark II (JP)

software.name: Sega SG-1000 Mark II
software.Description: SG-1000 is a Hardware game, developed and published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1983.
software.AKA: Sega SG-1000 (JP), Sega SC-3000 (JP), SG-1000 Hardware (AU, EU), Sega SG-1000 Mark II (JP)

software.name: Serizawa Hachidan no Tsume Shogi
software.Description: Serizawa Hachidan no Tsume Shogi is a Miscellaneous game, published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1983.

software.name: SG-1000
software.Description: SG-1000 is a Hardware game, developed and published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1983.

software.name: SG-1000 Hardware
software.Description: SG-1000 is a Hardware game, developed and published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1983.
software.AKA: Sega SG-1000 (JP), Sega SC-3000 (JP), SG-1000 Hardware (AU, EU), Sega SG-1000 Mark II (JP)

software.name: Shinnyuushain Tooru-kun
software.Description: Shinnyuushain Tooru-kun is an Action game, published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1985.

software.name: Sindbad Mystery
software.Description: SINDBAD, an adventurous boy, comes to TREASURE ISLAND. He wants to successfully find the treasure through the clues in the TREASURE MAP by opening the ? panels. To challenge him, MONSTERS are here and there, loitering in the maze-like routes on the island. Muster up your courage, roll the STONE forward and destroy the MONSTERS. After successfully finding the TREASURE, let's go on to the next adventure on another, more wonderous TREASURE ISLAND!

software.name: Soukoban
software.Description: Soukoban is a Puzzle game, developed and published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1985.

software.name: Space Armor
software.Description: Space Armor is an Action game, developed and published by Tsukuda Original, which was released in Japan in 1984.

software.name: Space Invaders
software.Description: Attention all Earthlings! Relentless alien hordes have been identified near you. Prevent the dangerous Space Invaders from landing on your territory. Use your cannon to defend against waves of descending alien invaders. Don't let them hit the ground or it's all over for you and the Earth! Destroy them and score points!

software.name: Space Mountain
software.Description: Space Mountain is an Action game, published by Tsukuda Original, which was released in Japan in 1983.

software.name: Space Slalom
software.Description: Space Slalom is an Action game, published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1983.

software.name: Star Force
software.Description: Moving in the darkness of the cosmos is an evil and mysterious planet named GORDESS. Everyone gave up fighting against GORDESS because of its awesome power, until one day a soldier riding a space patroller challenged GORDESS to fight! Join forces with STAR FORCE and travel across the galaxy in order to defeat GORDESS!

software.name: Star Jacker
software.Description: Star Jacker is an Action game, developed and published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1983.

software.name: Super Tank
software.Description: Super Tank is an Action game, published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1986.

software.name: Uranai Angel Cutie
software.Description: Uranai Angel Cutie is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1984.

software.name: Wonder Boy
software.Description: As Tom-Tom the Wonder Boy, it's up to you to rescue your girlfriend Tanya from the vile clutches of the monster that has kidnapped her. To do so, you must navigate a series of worlds in a race against time to reach your goal. Along the way, you'll battle foes and collect fruit that will add to the amount of time you have to complete your mission.

software.name: Yamato
software.Description: Yamato is an Action game, developed by ELS and published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1983.

software.name: Zaxxon
software.Description: ZAXXON thrusts you into the depths of outer space. Test your pilot skills as you strap into the command position. Prepare for an action-packed challenge of space survival. Score points as you dive, climb, and swoop down to destroy the enemy's floating fortress. Dodge deadly laser barriers, enemy missiles, and rapid gunfire! Destroy enemy fuel tanks and your own supply is replenished. Survive the enemy's fighter fleet attack and face the ultimate challenge... the powerful, armored ZAXXON ROBOT.

software.name: Zippy Race
software.Description: Zippy Race is a Racing game, published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1983.

software.name: Zoom 909
software.Description: Zoom 909 is an Action game, developed and published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1985.
